This is a test post

  test, hover, definition

The post has been created to test the functionality of the Jekyll Academic theme. It includes a title, a date, and a body with some sample text. The post also includes a table of contents, a list of tags, and a list of categories. And a word Lithuania (A country in Eastern Europe. Not part of the European Union. Not to be confused with Latvia. the main speaking languages are Lithuanian and Russian.) that should have a definition when hovering over it.
